MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in West Scotland Street Lane and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:15am due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11 AM on Monday, 18 January 2021.
